abstract: More than three years after appearing in Federal District Court in Manhattan on corporate theft charges, the former programmer, Sergey Aleynikov, was in a New York State court to plead not guilty to similar charges.
snippet: More than three years after appearing in Federal District Court in Manhattan on corporate theft charges, the former programmer, Sergey Aleynikov, was in a New York State court to plead not guilty to similar charges.

headline.main: Lawyer for Ex-Goldman Programmer Criticizes Prosecutors and Firm
